diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,126 @@
+#pragma once
+
+#include "ATen/ATen.h"
+#include <vector>
+
+/**
+ * ATen native functions are ways to write ATen methods which make only
+ * make use of other ATen operations (e.g., it is not necessary to
+ * bind into TH/THC code or drop into CUDA kernels.)  These functions
+ * are written as both functions as well as cwrap fragments, which are
+ * then folded into the ATen code generation process; define a function
+ * here, and it will show up as a method on at::Tensor.
+ *
+ * At the moment, only type_method_definition_level: base is supported.
body: Yes, my comment here is mostly conditional on, "If we accept this PR as is", even if we plan short term work to make it stop being the case.
body_html: Yes, my comment here is mostly conditional on, "If we accept this PR as is", even if we plan short term work to make it stop being the case.
body_text: Yes, my comment here is mostly conditional on, "If we accept this PR as is", even if we plan short term work to make it stop being the case.
